title: Font help for Interiors/Homes magazine
content:
You informed lot have helped me in the past with font suggestions for magazines, I love the variety of suggestions I get and it helps me to think out of the box. So ... I’ve been asked to help with an Interiors/Homes magazine redesign and we are looking for a font for the masthead as well as the headlines inside. The magazine is called Insite. Currently the masthead is set in OPTI aqueduct but it’s now looking a bit dated and tired and heavy. We want something more timeless, elegant, contemporary and strong. Headline and masthead fonts don’t necessarily have to be the same.

Thanks in advance!!

 [‹ AS Level Graphics Exam Review](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212910/http:/typophile.com/node/44221 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type Battle 21: FontStruct ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212910/http:/typophile.com/battle21 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fuschia101
